short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 1440 of 2023-10-02 at EST.
description: Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide an experienced facilitator to deliver a two-day seminar on Fiction Intelligence/Useful Fiction to the Canadian Forces College (CFC).
full_summary:
# Open Bidding: Request for Proposal for Fiction Intelligence/Useful Fiction Seminar
===============

**Government Tender Information:**

| Category | Information |
| :---------- | :-------------------------------------------------------------  |
| Reference Number | WS4200309864 Doc4212905781 |
| Solicitation Number | WS4200309864 |
| Posting Date | September 14, 2023 |
| Closing Date | October 2, 2023 at 14:00 EDT |
| Tender Status | Expiré (Expired) |

**Project Overview:**

Canada seeks proposals from experienced facilitators to deliver a two-day seminar on Fiction Intelligence/Useful Fiction to the Canadian Forces College (CFC).

**Project Details:**

| Category | Information |
| :------------- | :----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| UNSPSC | *86131800 - Military education |
| Procurement Category | SRV |
| Notice Type | Request for Proposal |
| Procurement Method | Competitive - Open Bidding |
| Trade Agreements | *Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement; Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA); Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA); Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA); Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement; Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement |

**Submission Requirements:**

Bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and bid submission by October 2, 2023, at 14:00 EDT. 

**Contact Information:**

For inquiries regarding this solicitation, please contact Alexa Fraser at [alexa.fraser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alexa.fraser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

**Tender Description:**

[Full Tender Description Link](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17453130?extsite=MTc0NTMxMzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Now you get a new task!

As a technical writer, you are also a ghost writer and are asked to write the contract for this project. Provide the contract in a `markdown` format. Here is the output specification: 

Contract
--------

Author: Alex Fraser. 

Subject: Fiction Intelligence/Useful Fiction Seminar Contract Issue - [IAG number].

Table of Contents
-----------------

1. [INTRODUCTION](#introduction)
2. [ DEFINITIONS](#definitions)
3. [ TERMS AND CONDITIONS](#terms-and-conditions)
4. [SCOPE OF WORK](#scope
